snippet: Shares of DuPont were up after the company’s embattled chief executive said she would retire next year. Energy stocks climbed with the price of oil.
abstract: Stocks close slightly lower after five consecutive days of gains, weighed down primarily by health care stocks.
lead_paragraph: Shares of DuPont were up after the company’s embattled chief executive said she would retire next year. Energy stocks climbed with the price of oil.

headline.main: Markets Take a Breather After 5 Days of Gains
headline.print_headline: Markets Take a Breather After 5 Days of Gains
